text:
Here's Proposal A......
Then there's Proposal B, Proposal C......

Thank you very much......!
All of these outfits are lovely.

<line-height=80%><size=80%>Haha, the designer also said they were very confident about this one.
They couldn't stop coming up with ideas once they started imagining Higuchi-san.

We're inclined towards Proposal A.
The motifs are autumn, dusk...... and butterflies......!

Yes, what do you think?
Please don't hesitate to share your opinions, Higuchi-san.

Oh...... right, Madoka.
Please feel free to voice your thoughts if you have any.
Proposal A, I think it's really wonderful.
